Entities.Name: Housing
Entities.Definition: Patient’s living situation and housing conditions.

Entities.Name: Food
Entities.Definition: Patient’s access to sufficient and nutritious food.

Entities.Name: Finances
Entities.Definition: Patient’s financial resources and economic stability.

Entities.Name: Social Support
Entities.Definition: Presence or absence of supportive social relationships.

Entities.Name: Marital and Partnership Status
Entities.Definition: Patient’s current relationship or marital status.

Entities.Name: Depression
Entities.Definition: Mentions of depressive symptoms or diagnosis.

Entities.Name: Anxiety
Entities.Definition: Mentions of anxiety symptoms or diagnosis.

Entities.Name: Pain Scores
Entities.Definition: Reported or documented pain levels or scores.

Entities.Name: Insurance Status
Entities.Definition: Presence or absence of health insurance coverage.

Dataset.Name: Annotated Clinical Notes of cLBP Patients at UCSF
Dataset.Description: A corpus of 1576 clinical notes from UCSF patients with chronic lower back pain (cLBP), annotated for social determinants of health (SDoH), behavioral health, and pain information.

AnnotationGuidelines.Description: Annotations were conducted using MAE software based on a two-level taxonomy of 10 domains and 52 subcategories. Each span in the text corresponding to SDoH was labeled with a first- and second-level category. Ambiguous or rare cases were labeled as 'NA'.
